entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Trump you were grossly negligent & totally incompetent! You sat on your big fat orange ass for 2 months & did absolutely nothing, which allowed the coronavirus to get a strong foothold in the US! You downplayed it and called it a hoax!  YOU are responsible for this health crisis!
